Docs.summary: Specifies the unit of measure for the given data.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> handle, using the GraphicsUnit enumeration, and the use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap.
This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. Create a form that contains a button named Button2. Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
